description: This is a JavaScript module defining a UI component called 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It includes template, state, and input handling logic for a toggle button.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A class from LightningJS framework used to define reusable UI components.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML-like template for rendering the Button component with a Text element that changes content based on state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initial state of the Button component, including whether it is favorited and the corresponding display text.

methods.name: input
methods.description: Input handler object for managing user interactions, specifically toggling the favorited state on 'enter' press.
